job.title: Software Documentation Engineer
job.description: Position Software Documentation EngineerltbrgtltbrgtWill be responsible for all commercial and project needs for Telkom Tribe Travel Tourism wonderinid amp travelajaidltbrgtltbrgtQualificationltbrgtltbrgt Min 1 years experience in same or related positionltbrgt Experienced in creating software documentation and diagram such as Usecase UML Flowchart Activity Diagram user guide system documentation testing documentation etcltbrgt Good Knowledge of Database ERD DFD or other Data modelltbrgt Familiar with ConfluenceJIRA Database API and Agile Methodology such as Scrum or Kanban is a huge advantageltbrgtltbrgtJob Descriptionltbrgtltbrgt Create update and maintain all documentation each of software  product life cycleltbrgt write script diagrams and so forth for helping others to understand a system workltbrgt Within a crossfunctional team collaborate with other developers software architect quality assurance UI designer UX researcher product owner and scrum masterltbrgt Scripting for API Documentation and Mockupltbrgt Learn multiple tools for the jobltbrgt Create data model diagram workflow and so forth to assist technical team
